title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: A vanishing star births a black hole—without the fireworks
items.description: Failed supernova candidate points to a stealthy pathway of stellar collapse

items.title: Boosting origin of life theory, RNA comes close to copying itself
items.description: Some RNA molecules can create their own mirror images, suggesting similar molecules could have sparked life

items.title: NSF’s flagship fellowship program is rejecting applicants without peer review
items.description: Students seeking graduate research scholarships speculate that biology is being disfavored

items.title: Can science build a better working dog?
items.description: New approaches could put talented canines into the hands of more people with disabilities

items.title: Politics and war complicate global effort to study changes to Earth’s poles
items.description: As preparations for the fifth International Polar Year kick off, organizers grapple with U.S. climate skepticism and Russia’s invasion of Ukraine

items.title: Rare, dangerous side effects of some COVID-19 vaccines explained
items.description: “Groundbreaking” study uncovers why adenovirus-based shots caused life-threatening blood clots and bleeding in some people

items.title: Pre-Incans collected seabird poop from remote islands to use as fertilizer
items.description: Guano-based agriculture became highly prized in the Inca empire

items.title: India has big plans to remove silt from rivers, alarming scientists
items.description: Dredging and mining sediments increases flood risks and threatens infrastructure, researchers say

items.title: Snapping shrimp use headgear to protect their brains from shock waves
items.description: Unusual “hood” is the first known biological armor that protects against traumatic brain injury

items.title: How did ancient Vietnamese people get such black smiles?
items.description: Iron salt toothpaste darkened pearly whites
